data.name: HOT WHEELS™ - TMNT Leonardo
data.detailed_description:
COWABUNGA! If you are looking for a masterpiece on four-wheels you have come to the right place: straight from the world of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, here is the racing car inspired by Leonardo! With its green body, blue mask and the legendary double katana as the rear spoiler, HOT WHEELS™ - TMNT Leonardo will take you from the sewers to the top of the podium.

Master the art of overtaking, draw phenomenal trajectories and shred the competition like a real warrior. We are pretty sure you've never seen a Turtle this fast. Complete your collection now!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

data.short_description: COWABUNGA! This Leonardo-inspired car is a true masterpiece! With the blue mask and the legendary double katana as the rear spoiler, HOT WHEELS™ - TMNT Leonardo will take you from the sewers to the top of the podium. You’ve never seen a Turtle this fast!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5820K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
